dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach investments?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be willing to take bold risks and invest heavily in potential high-gains opportunities.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and avoid taking significant risks, focusing on low-risk investments.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on logic and data-driven analysis to make informed decisions.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on creative, out-of-the-box thinking to solve problems.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: What drives your FarTwin's career aspirations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize financial stability and security in their professional life.
Your FarTwin will be driven by a desire to make a meaningful impact, pursue their passions, and leave a lasting legacy.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing, sociable, and enjoy being around people, often seeking social interaction.
Your FarTwin will prefer to spend time alone, recharge, and may find large social gatherings overwhelming.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through practical experience, experimentation, and hands-on activities.
Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through reading, research, and theoretical understanding.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize their daily tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will plan out their day, set deadlines, and stick to a schedule.
Your FarTwin will be more spontaneous, adapting to changing circumstances and priorities as needed.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express their emotions freely, openly communicating their feelings with others.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions to themselves, only sharing them when necessary or with trusted individuals.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creative problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will think outside the box, coming up with novel solutions to complex problems.
Your FarTwin will approach creative problem-solving methodically, breaking down complex issues into manageable parts.
